@_JConner No problem! I recommend using some browser's console and just messing around (Firefox has the Firebug extension, Chrome has built in developer tools), too. Everyone learns differently,  I think, and I swear I can read a whole technical book and not learn a thing.
@jasonlong I like to get all fancy with graph paper and a liquid graphite pen.
